testcase.name: Create a new store & verify if the store is added

error.message: Arity mismatch: Step Definition 'com.bestbuy.cucumber.steps.StoreStepdefs.iCreateANewStoreByProvidingTheInformationNameTypeAddressAddressCityStateZipLatLngHours(String,String,String,String,String,String,String,double,double,String) in file:/C:/Users/giris/IdeaProjects/bestbuy-serenity-wk-19-Priya/target/test-classes/' with pattern [^I create a new store by providing the information name "([^"]*)" type "([^"]*)" address "([^"]*)" address(\d+) "([^"]*)" city "([^"]*)" state "([^"]*)" zip "([^"]*)" lat "([^"]*)" lng "([^"]*)" hours "([^"]*)"$] is declared with 10 parameters. However, the gherkin step has 11 arguments [Minnetonka, BigBox, 13513 ridgedale, 2, , Hopkins, MN, 55305, , , ]. Step: When I create a new store by providing the information name "Minnetonka" type "BigBox" address "13513 ridgedale" address2 "" city "Hopkins" state "MN" zip "55305" lat "" lng "" hours ""
